casebody.data:
FAIRFIELD MERRITTVIEW LIMITED PARTNERSHIP
v.
CITY OF NORWALK et. al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided May 24, 2017

Carolyn M. Colangelo, assistant corporation counsel, and Daniel J. Krisch, in support of the petition.

James R. Fogarty, in opposition.

The named defendant's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 172 Conn. App. 160, 159 A.3d 684 (2017), is denied.
